title: DELMADE RELEASES the NEW + UPGRADED Delmade MkII Ripper Pipe Layer

tasks.task: Present and describe a new design of Ripper Pipe Player
subtasks: Announce the new design to the audience
Highlight the square reel and its lower center to the ground
Explain the purpose of the square reel design
Mention the addition of fork pockets for easier loading
Note the benefits of fork pockets for moving between properties
Describe the improved storage efficiency of the Ripper's legs
Encourage audience to contact the team with questions
